main event: A civilian observed a round, saucer-shaped object near Orfordville, Wisconsin on 15 March 1966.
interesting points: The object climbed and dove multiple times, appearing to go against the wind,The observer initially thought the object was a balloon,The UFO was described as having a red glow and tiny holes around it,The observation lasted for about 3 to 4 minutes,The weather during the sighting was clear with good visibility.
sighted object: round, saucer-shaped UFO with red glow
witness description: male, 30 years old, observed the object with binoculars
